name: 吳浴沂
objective:
引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
Engine Types and Their Operation, Ideal Models of Engine Cycles, Engine Design and Operating Parameters, Thermodynamic of Fuel-Air Mixtures, Properties of Working Fluids, Practical Models of Engine Cycles, Combustion Features and Analysis, Pollutant Control, Engine Control, Engine Performance and Characteristics Analysis
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	教科書章節
1	Introduction	Ch. 1
2	Introduction, Operating Characteristics	Ch. 1, 2
3	Operating Characteristics, Engine Cycles	Ch. 2, 3
4	Thermochemistry and Fuel	Ch. 4
5	 (4/2清明節補假一天)	
6	Air Induction	Ch. 5
7	Fuel Induction	Ch. 5
8	Fluid Motion	Ch. 6
9	期中考	
10	Technical Report, Combustion	Notes, Ch. 7
11	Combustion	Ch. 7
12	Combustion	Ch. 7
13	Emissions and Air Pollution	Ch. 9
14	Emissions and Air Pollution	Ch. 9
15	Emissions and Air Pollution	Ch. 9
16	Heat Transfer in Engines        Ch. 10
（6月17日交期末報告）	
17	Friction and Lubrication, Engine Test	Ch. 11, Notes
18	期末報告檢討
scorePolicy:
期中考：30%
期末報告：30% 
    基本架構：15%；內容：10%；參考文獻：5%
    自訂題目，可以是：學習心得報告、省油車技術、內燃機新技術探索、車輛時事評論…等。第16週上課前一天(109.6.17)於北科i學園繳交，遲交者每延遲1天扣5分，抄襲與被抄襲者皆以0分計。
隨堂考：30%  (筆試5次)
點名：10% 缺席1次扣2分
materials:
Engineering Fundamental of the Internal Combustion Engines, 2nd Edition
By: Willard W. Pulkrabek
